languages.text: {n}Вольный Торговец обнажает зубы в жестокой улыбке — и вам на мгновение кажется, что вместо резцов вы заметили в оскале острые клыки.{/n} "Давненько я ждал возможности схлестнуться с этими шавками".

traits.locale_text: "Своим чередом, {name}". {n}Вольный Торговец обнажает зубы в жестокой улыбке — и вам на мгновение кажется, что вместо резцов вы заметили в оскале острые клыки.{/n} "Я уже знаю, за чьей головой отправлюсь дальше".
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile. For just a moment, it seems that instead of teeth, you glimpse the sharp fangs of some beast.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those mongrels."
languages.original_text: {n}Вольный Торговец обнажает зубы в жестокой улыбке — и вам на мгновение кажется, что вместо резцов вы заметили в оскале острые клыки.{/n} "Давненько я ждал возможности схлестнуться с этими шавками".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile, and you have the fleeting impression of seeing a beast's sharp fangs in that smile instead of regular teeth.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those pitiful mutts."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile, and you have the fleeting impression of seeing a beast's sharp fangs in that smile instead of regular teeth.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those pitiful mutts."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile. For just a moment, it seems that instead of teeth, you glimpse the sharp fangs of some beast.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those mongrels."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile. For just a moment, it seems that instead of teeth, you glimpse the sharp fangs of some beast.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those mongrels."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}El Comerciante Independiente esboza una cruel sonrisa que enseña su dentadura. Durante un fugaz instante tienes la impresión de que, en lugar de dientes, lo que tiene son los colmillos afilados de una bestia.{/n} «Llevaba mucho tiempo esperando una oportunidad para entrar en liza con esos perros».
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile. For just a moment, it seems that instead of teeth, you glimpse the sharp fangs of some beast.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those mongrels."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comerciante Independiente esboza una cruel sonrisa que enseña su dentadura. Durante un fugaz instante tienes la impresión de que, en lugar de dientes, lo que tiene son los colmillos afilados de una bestia.{/n} «Llevaba mucho tiempo esperando una oportunidad para entrar en liza con esos perros».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯咧开嘴，露出牙齿，脸上浮现了残酷的笑容。有那么一瞬间，你觉得你看到的并不是人类的牙齿，而是野兽的尖牙。{/n}“我一直都在等待机会，和那群杂种决一死战。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile. For just a moment, it seems that instead of teeth, you glimpse the sharp fangs of some beast.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those mongrels."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯咧开嘴，露出牙齿，脸上浮现了残酷的笑容。有那么一瞬间，你觉得你看到的并不是人类的牙齿，而是野兽的尖牙。{/n}“我一直都在等待机会，和那群杂种决一死战。”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Le libre-marchand vous adresse un sourire cruel. L'espace d'un instant, il vous semble apercevoir les crocs acérés d'un animal sauvage à la place de ses dents.{/n} « Ça faisait bien longtemps que j'attendais l'occasion d'affronter ces vermines. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile. For just a moment, it seems that instead of teeth, you glimpse the sharp fangs of some beast.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those mongrels."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le libre-marchand vous adresse un sourire cruel. L'espace d'un instant, il vous semble apercevoir les crocs acérés d'un animal sauvage à la place de ses dents.{/n} « Ça faisait bien longtemps que j'attendais l'occasion d'affronter ces vermines. »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}自由開拓者が歯をむき出しにして残酷な笑みを浮かべる。一瞬、歯の代わりに獣の鋭い牙が見えたように思えた。{/n}「俺は長い間、あの雑種どもとの戦いに身を投じる機会を待っていたんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile. For just a moment, it seems that instead of teeth, you glimpse the sharp fangs of some beast.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those mongrels."

traits.locale_text: {n}自由開拓者が歯をむき出しにして残酷な笑みを浮かべる。一瞬、歯の代わりに獣の鋭い牙が見えたように思えた。{/n}「俺は長い間、あの雑種どもとの戦いに身を投じる機会を待っていたんだ」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Der Freihändler fletscht die Zähne zu seinem grausamen Grinsen. Einen Augenblick lang wirkt es, als würdest du die scharfen Reißzähne einer wilden Bestie sehen.{/n} "Ich warte schon lang auf eine Gelegenheit, mit diesen Mischlingen zu kämpfen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile. For just a moment, it seems that instead of teeth, you glimpse the sharp fangs of some beast.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those mongrels."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Freihändler fletscht die Zähne zu seinem grausamen Grinsen. Einen Augenblick lang wirkt es, als würdest du die scharfen Reißzähne einer wilden Bestie sehen.{/n} "Ich warte schon lang auf eine Gelegenheit, mit diesen Mischlingen zu kämpfen."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: {n}Hür Tacir, acımasız bir gülümsemeyle dişlerini gösteriyor. Bir anlığına sanki bir canavarın keskin dişlerini görmüş gibi oluyorsun.{/n} "O melezlerle savaşa girmek için uzun zamandır fırsat kolluyordum."
languages.original_text: {n}The Rogue Trader bares his teeth in a cruel smile. For just a moment, it seems that instead of teeth, you glimpse the sharp fangs of some beast.{/n} "I had long been waiting for an opportunity to get into the fray with those mongrels."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hür Tacir, acımasız bir gülümsemeyle dişlerini gösteriyor. Bir anlığına diş yerine bir canavarın keskin dişlerini görmüş gibi oluyorsun.{/n} "O melezlerle savaşa girmek için uzun zamandır fırsat kolluyordum."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion
